document.full_text: hedge funds are back and bigger than ever. fueled by fresh investor demand, these loosely regulated portfolios now manage $2.02 trillion, marking an all-time high for the industry, data released on tuesday by hedge fund research (hfr) show.
document.title: hedge funds oversee $2.02 trillion, hit new record
lines_and_colors: hedge funds are back and bigger than ever. fueled by fresh investor demand, these loosely regulated portfolios now manage $2.02 trillion, marking an all-time high for the industry, data released on tuesday by hedge fund research (hfr) show.
